ensg.tsi.majortom

Class LinearTransfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensg.tsi.majortom.Transformation
      • ensg.tsi.majortom.LinearTransfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class LinearTransfo
extends Transformation
    Concrete class for linear transformation. This transformation is defined by 3 parameters : dx, dy and dz.
    Author:
    Rose Mathelier
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • setTransfoFromGCP

        public void setTransfoFromGCP()
        Method to compute the linear parameters of the transformation using the ground control points. Implementation method of the abstract function from class Transformation. Sets the parameters and residuals attributes of class transformation according to the results of this computation. The parameters are set according to the average difference in x, y and z of the control points. Always set the residuals to a list of 0 in the case of a linear transformation
        Specified by:
        setTransfoFromGCP in class Transformation
        See Also:
        LinearParam

      • getNbMinGCP

        public int getNbMinGCP()
        Method to get the minimum number of control points necessary to perform the transformation. Implementation method of the abstract function from class Transformation. Always returns 1 for a linear transformation
        Specified by:
        getNbMinGCP in class Transformation
        Returns:
        The minimum number of control points necessary to perform the transformation.
        See Also:
        Transformation
